DOC.detailed_description: This study do evaluate performance Restorelle system , use Smartmesh - ultra-lightweight mesh uterine prolapse management . Most patient undergo hysterectomy i.e . removal uterus prolapse . However , often find unnecessary operation . The investigator study use Restorelle mesh system preserve uterus uterine prolapse .

Subject uterine prolapse define Prolapse Quantification System Assessment ( POPQ ) score C 2 great . 5 . Subject report bothersome bulge see feel per Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory Short Form 20 ( PFDI20 ) question 3 , response 2 high ( i.e . response `` somewhat '' , `` moderately '' `` quite bit '' ) . 6 . Subject willing provide write informed consent . 7 . Subject willing able comply followup regimen . 1 . Subject pregnant intend become pregnant future . 2 .
